title: Reorder homepage sections to Story → Characters → Clans → Episodes → Gallery → News

requirements.summary: Ensure the main homepage sections render in the required vertical order while preserving all existing section DOM ids used by header navigation scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: On the main (non-admin) view, the rendered section order from top to bottom is: Hero, Story/About, Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News / Updates.

Clicking HeaderNav items (Story, Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News) scrolls to the correct section and the section ids remain unchanged (#about, #characters, #clans, #episodes, #gallery, #news).
No new sections are added and no section content is removed; this change is layout/order only.

file_operations.description: Reorder the existing homepage section component render sequence in <main> to match: Hero → About (Story) → Characters → Clans → Episodes → Gallery → News, without changing any section component implementations or their DOM ids.

Verify the existing nav link targets remain mapped to the unchanged section ids (#hero, #about, #characters, #clans, #episodes, #gallery, #news) and keep the navigation list aligned with the updated section order (layout/order only; no new links required).
